title: Bans
body: So I have gotten a 2 week int suspension and 1 chat ban if I get one more penalty whether it being a chat ban or any type of suspension will my account be perma banned?

replies.body: The next step for offense would be a permanent suspension. As long as you're able to show reform and not get any reports it's entirely possible for you to move back down in offenses and not get that perma.
If you get banned again on your account, you will most likely be permanently banned since you already have a 2 week suspension.
